tossup_question: 9) PHYSICS  Which of these rays have the highest ionising power?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Alpha
X) Beta
Y) Gamma
Z) They all have the same ionising power
bonus_question: 9) PHYSICS  A 0.5kg ball is about to roll off the edge of a 1.5m tall table. What is its current potential energy? Assume gravity = 10m/s^2
